resources.string: Thank you for installing this app. This is the history screen, it will be blank untill you upload an Image. To upload an image, first find an image in another app (e.g. Gallery or Astro) and choose "Share" in the menu. There should be an imgur item in the list. For more information try this page: http://wiki.github.com/phrack/imgur-Uploader/quick-usage-guide
